quiz.question: decrepit ________
quiz.explanation: 破旧的; 衰老的, 破旧的建筑. The decrepit building was scheduled for demolition. 这座破旧的建筑计划拆除。

quiz.question: pulpit ______
quiz.explanation: 讲道坛, 讲道坛布道. The minister delivered a pulpit sermon on forgiveness. 牧师在讲道坛上发表了关于宽恕的布道。

quiz.question: merit ___
quiz.explanation: 功绩; 优点, 绩效工资. Employees receive merit pay based on performance. 员工根据表现获得绩效工资。

quiz.question: _____ _ writ
quiz.explanation: 令状; 文书, 发出令状. The court will issue a writ of habeas corpus. 法院将发出人身保护令状。

quiz.question: posit _ ______
quiz.explanation: 假定; 提出, 提出理论. Scientists posit a theory to explain the phenomenon. 科学家提出理论来解释这一现象。

quiz.question: ____ deposit
quiz.explanation: 存款; 押金, 银行存款. She made a bank deposit of her paycheck. 她将薪水存入了银行存款。

quiz.question: ________ circuit
quiz.explanation: 电路; 巡回, 电路. The electric circuit powers all the lights. 电路为所有灯供电。

quiz.question: _____ conduit
quiz.explanation: 管道; 导管, 水管. The water conduit supplies the entire neighborhood. 水管供应整个社区。

quiz.question: bruit _____
quiz.explanation: 传播; 散布, 四处传播. Don't bruit about confidential information. 不要四处传播机密信息。

quiz.question: recruit ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 招募; 新兵, 招募新成员. The club aims to recruit new members this year. 俱乐部今年旨在招募新成员。

quiz.question: _____ affidavit
quiz.explanation: 宣誓书, 宣誓的宣誓书. He signed a sworn affidavit before the notary. 他在公证人面前签署了宣誓书。

quiz.question: _____ wit
quiz.explanation: 机智; 才智, 敏锐的机智. Her sharp wit made her a popular speaker. 她敏锐的机智使她成为受欢迎的演讲者。

quiz.question: exalt ______
quiz.explanation: 赞扬; 提升, 赞扬美德. Religious texts often exalt virtue and righteousness. 宗教文本经常赞扬美德和正义。

quiz.question: tilt __ _________
quiz.explanation: 倾斜; 攻击, 攻击风车(徒劳的战斗). Don't tilt at windmills like Don Quixote. 不要像堂吉诃德那样攻击风车。

quiz.question: _________ bolt
quiz.explanation: 螺栓; 闪电, 闪电. A lightning bolt struck the tree during the storm. 暴风雨期间,闪电击中了树。

quiz.question: revolt _______
quiz.explanation: 反叛; 起义, 反抗. Citizens began to revolt against the oppressive regime. 公民开始反抗压迫性政权。

quiz.question: fault ____
quiz.explanation: 断层; 过错, 断层线. The earthquake occurred along a major fault line. 地震发生在主要断层线上。

quiz.question: ____ vault
quiz.explanation: 金库; 跳跃, 银行金库. Valuables are stored in the bank vault. 贵重物品存放在银行金库中。

quiz.question: occult ________
quiz.explanation: 神秘的; 玄学的, 神秘实践. Some people study occult practice and mysticism. 有些人研究神秘实践和神秘主义。

quiz.question: ______ catapult
quiz.explanation: 弹射器; 猛然推进, 发射弹射器. Ancient armies would launch catapult projectiles. 古代军队会发射弹射器抛射物。

quiz.question: exult __ _______
quiz.explanation: 欢欣鼓舞; 狂喜, 为胜利欢欣鼓舞. The team will exult in victory after the championship. 球队将在赢得冠军后为胜利欢欣鼓舞。

quiz.question: _____ cant
quiz.explanation: 伪善的话; 行话, 虚伪的伪善话. His pious cant fooled no one. 他虚伪的伪善话骗不了任何人。

quiz.question: decant ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 倒酒; 倾析, 倒酒. Let the wine breathe, then decant the wine carefully. 让酒透气,然后小心地倒酒。

quiz.question: recant _________
quiz.explanation: 撤回; 放弃, 撤回证词. The witness refused to recant testimony under pressure. 证人拒绝在压力下撤回证词。

quiz.question: _______ mendicant
quiz.explanation: 乞丐; 托钵僧, 乞讨的乞丐. The begging mendicant asked for alms on the street. 乞讨的乞丐在街上乞求施舍。

quiz.question: _____________ significant
quiz.explanation: 重要的; 显著的, 统计上显著的. The results were statistically significant at the 0.05 level. 结果在0.05水平上具有统计显著性。

quiz.question: ___ applicant
quiz.explanation: 申请人, 求职者. The job applicant submitted an impressive resume. 求职者提交了一份令人印象深刻的简历。

quiz.question: ______ supplicant
quiz.explanation: 恳求者; 哀求者, 谦卑的恳求者. The humble supplicant begged for mercy. 谦卑的恳求者乞求怜悯。

quiz.question: ______ lubricant
quiz.explanation: 润滑剂, 发动机润滑剂. Regular engine lubricant changes extend vehicle life. 定期更换发动机润滑剂可延长车辆寿命。

quiz.question: scant ________
quiz.explanation: 不足的; 缺乏的, 缺乏的证据. There was scant evidence to support the claim. 几乎没有证据支持这一说法。

quiz.question: __________ pedant
quiz.explanation: 学究; 书呆子, 吹毛求疵的学究. The nitpicking pedant corrected every minor error. 吹毛求疵的学究纠正每个小错误。

quiz.question: _______ confidant
quiz.explanation: 密友; 知己, 值得信赖的密友. She shared her secrets with her trusted confidant. 她与她值得信赖的密友分享秘密。

quiz.question: ______ descendant
quiz.explanation: 后裔; 后代, 直系后代. He is a direct descendant of the founder. 他是创始人的直系后代。

quiz.question: ________ defendant
quiz.explanation: 被告, 刑事被告. The criminal defendant pleaded not guilty. 刑事被告表示不认罪。

quiz.question: abundant ______
quiz.explanation: 丰富的; 充裕的, 充足的供应. The region has an abundant supply of fresh water. 该地区有充足的淡水供应。

quiz.question: verdant _____
quiz.explanation: 翠绿的; 青翠的, 翠绿的田野. Spring rains create verdant field landscapes. 春雨造就了翠绿的田野景观。

quiz.question: mordant ___
quiz.explanation: 尖刻的; 讽刺的, 尖刻的机智. His mordant wit could be quite cutting. 他尖刻的机智可能相当刺耳。

quiz.question: ______ pageant
quiz.explanation: 选美; 盛典, 选美比赛. She competed in the beauty pageant last summer. 她去年夏天参加了选美比赛。

quiz.question: _____ litigant
quiz.explanation: 诉讼当事人, 民事诉讼当事人. The civil litigant filed a lawsuit for damages. 民事诉讼当事人提起损害赔偿诉讼。

quiz.question: enchant ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 使着迷; 施魔法, 使人群着迷. The magician's tricks will enchant the crowd. 魔术师的戏法将使人群着迷。

quiz.question: penchant ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 嗜好; 倾向, 对爵士乐的嗜好. He has a penchant for jazz music. 他对爵士乐有嗜好。

quiz.question: trenchant ________
quiz.explanation: 尖锐的; 鲜明的, 尖锐的批评. The reviewer wrote a trenchant critique of the film. 评论家对这部电影写了尖锐的批评。

quiz.question: disenchant ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 使幻想破灭, 使公众幻想破灭. The scandal will disenchant the public with politics. 这起丑闻将使公众对政治幻想破灭。

quiz.question: __________ sycophant
quiz.explanation: 马屁精; 谄媚者, 谄媚的马屁精. The obsequious sycophant flattered the boss constantly. 谄媚的马屁精不断奉承老板。

quiz.question: insouciant _____
quiz.explanation: 漫不经心的; 无忧无虑的, 漫不经心的微笑. She wore an insouciant smile despite the troubles. 尽管有麻烦,她脸上还是带着漫不经心的微笑。

quiz.question: valiant ______
quiz.explanation: 英勇的; 勇敢的, 英勇的努力. They made a valiant effort to save the company. 他们做出了拯救公司的英勇努力。

quiz.question: ____ defoliant
quiz.explanation: 落叶剂, 落叶剂. Agent Orange was a powerful leaf defoliant used in war. 橙剂是战争中使用的强力落叶剂。

quiz.question: pliant ________
quiz.explanation: 柔软的; 易弯曲的, 柔韧的材料. Leather becomes pliant material when properly treated. 皮革经过适当处理后会变成柔韧的材料。

quiz.question: compliant ________
quiz.explanation: 顺从的; 服从的, 顺从的行为. The regulations require compliant behavior from all staff. 法规要求所有员工有顺从的行为。

quiz.question: ________ suppliant
quiz.explanation: 恳求的; 哀求者, 跪着的恳求者. The kneeling suppliant begged for forgiveness. 跪着的恳求者乞求宽恕。

quiz.question: luxuriant ______
quiz.explanation: 茂盛的; 丰富的, 茂盛的生长. The tropical rainforest shows luxuriant growth. 热带雨林显示出茂盛的生长。

quiz.question: deviant ________
quiz.explanation: 偏离的; 异常的, 偏离的行为. Psychologists study deviant behavior patterns. 心理学家研究偏离的行为模式。

quiz.question: nonchalant ________
quiz.explanation: 冷淡的; 漠不关心的, 冷淡的态度. His nonchalant attitude masked deep concerns. 他冷淡的态度掩盖了深深的担忧。

quiz.question: sibilant ____
quiz.explanation: 咝咝作响的, 咝咝的嘶嘶声. The snake made a sibilant hiss as a warning. 蛇发出咝咝的嘶嘶声作为警告。

quiz.question: jubilant _____
quiz.explanation: 欢欣鼓舞的, 欢欣鼓舞的人群. The jubilant crowd celebrated the team's victory. 欢欣鼓舞的人群庆祝球队的胜利。

quiz.question: vigilant _____
quiz.explanation: 警惕的; 警觉的, 警惕的监视. Security maintains a vigilant watch over the premises. 保安对场所保持警惕的监视。

quiz.question: implant ______
quiz.explanation: 植入; 灌输, 植入装置. The surgeon inserted an implant device in the patient. 外科医生在患者体内插入了植入装置。

quiz.question: supplant _ ______
quiz.explanation: 取代; 代替, 取代领导者. The coup attempt sought to supplant a leader. 政变企图试图取代领导者。

quiz.question: _____ coagulant
quiz.explanation: 凝结剂, 血液凝固剂. The blood coagulant helps stop excessive bleeding. 血液凝固剂有助于止血。

quiz.question: petulant _____
quiz.explanation: 任性的; 脾气坏的, 任性的孩子. The petulant child threw a tantrum in the store. 任性的孩子在商店里发脾气。

quiz.question: dormant _______
quiz.explanation: 休眠的; 静止的, 休眠的火山. Scientists monitor the dormant volcano for activity. 科学家监测休眠火山的活动。

quiz.question: _________ tenant
quiz.explanation: 房客; 承租人, 公寓租户. The apartment tenant pays rent on the first of each month. 公寓租户每月一号支付租金。

quiz.question: _______ covenant
quiz.explanation: 契约; 盟约, 有约束力的契约. They signed a binding covenant to share resources. 他们签署了一项有约束力的资源共享契约。

quiz.question: stagnant ____
quiz.explanation: 停滞的; 不流动的, 停滞的水池. Mosquitoes breed in stagnant pool water. 蚊子在停滞的水池中繁殖。

quiz.question: pregnant _____
quiz.explanation: 怀孕的; 意味深长的, 意味深长的停顿. There was a pregnant pause before she answered. 她回答前有一个意味深长的停顿。

quiz.question: malignant _____
quiz.explanation: 恶性的; 有害的, 恶性肿瘤. The biopsy revealed a malignant tumor. 活检显示有恶性肿瘤。

quiz.question: poignant _____
quiz.explanation: 辛酸的; 深刻的, 辛酸的场景. The movie's ending featured a poignant scene. 电影的结局有一个辛酸的场景。

quiz.question: repugnant ___
quiz.explanation: 令人厌恶的; 可憎的, 令人厌恶的行为. The crime was a repugnant act that shocked everyone. 这起犯罪是令人厌恶的行为,震惊了所有人。

quiz.question: dominant ________
quiz.explanation: 占优势的; 支配的, 主导地位. The company holds a dominant position in the market. 该公司在市场上占据主导地位。

quiz.question: predominant ______
quiz.explanation: 主要的; 占优势的, 主要因素. Price was the predominant factor in their decision. 价格是他们决定的主要因素。

quiz.question: ___ determinant
quiz.explanation: 决定因素, 关键决定因素. Education is a key determinant of success. 教育是成功的关键决定因素。

quiz.question: ruminant ______
quiz.explanation: 反刍动物, 反刍动物. Cows are ruminant animal with multiple stomach chambers. 牛是有多个胃室的反刍动物。

quiz.question: ____ pennant
quiz.explanation: 锦旗; 三角旗, 球队锦旗. The baseball team pennant hung in the stadium. 棒球队锦旗悬挂在体育场。

quiz.question: resonant _____
quiz.explanation: 共鸣的; 洪亮的, 洪亮的声音. His resonant voice filled the concert hall. 他洪亮的声音充满了音乐厅。

quiz.question: consonant _______
quiz.explanation: 辅音; 一致的, 辅音群. English has many consonant cluster combinations. 英语有许多辅音群组合。

quiz.question: dissonant _____
quiz.explanation: 不和谐的; 刺耳的, 不和谐的和弦. The composer used a dissonant chord for tension. 作曲家使用不和谐的和弦来制造紧张感。

quiz.question: rampant _____
quiz.explanation: 猖獗的; 蔓延的, 猖獗的犯罪. Rampant crime plagued the neighborhood. 猖獗的犯罪困扰着这个社区。

quiz.question: flippant ______
quiz.explanation: 轻率的; 无礼的, 轻率的评论. His flippant remark offended the grieving family. 他轻率的评论冒犯了悲伤的家人。

quiz.question: rant ______
quiz.explanation: 咆哮; 激烈演说, 激烈演说. The politician delivered an angry rant speech. 这位政客发表了愤怒的激烈演说。

quiz.question: vibrant _________
quiz.explanation: 充满活力的; 鲜艳的, 充满活力的社区. The city has a vibrant community of artists. 这座城市有一个充满活力的艺术家社区。

quiz.question: ______ hydrant
quiz.explanation: 消防栓, 街道消防栓. Firefighters connected hoses to the street hydrant. 消防员将水管连接到街道消防栓。

quiz.question: _ preponderant _____
quiz.explanation: 占优势的; 主要的, 主要份额. He inherited a preponderant share of the estate. 他继承了遗产的主要份额。

quiz.question: itinerant ______
quiz.explanation: 巡回的; 流动的, 流动工人. The itinerant worker traveled from farm to farm. 流动工人从一个农场到另一个农场。

quiz.question: __________ grant
quiz.explanation: 授予; 拨款, 政府拨款. The research was funded by a government grant. 这项研究由政府拨款资助。

quiz.question: fragrant _______
quiz.explanation: 芳香的; 香的, 芳香的花朵. Spring brings fragrant blossom to the gardens. 春天给花园带来芳香的花朵。

quiz.question: ____________ aspirant
quiz.explanation: 有抱负者; 候选人, 总统候选人. The presidential aspirant announced his campaign. 总统候选人宣布了他的竞选活动。

quiz.question: ______ warrant
quiz.explanation: 授权; 搜查令, 搜查令. Police obtained a search warrant for the premises. 警方获得了对该场所的搜查令。

quiz.question: aberrant ________
quiz.explanation: 异常的; 偏离的, 异常行为. The psychologist studied aberrant behavior patterns. 心理学家研究异常行为模式。

quiz.question: recalcitrant _____
quiz.explanation: 顽固的; 不服从的, 顽固的孩子. The recalcitrant child refused all discipline. 顽固的孩子拒绝所有纪律。

quiz.question: _____ tyrant
quiz.explanation: 暴君; 专制君主, 残酷的暴君. The cruel tyrant oppressed his people for decades. 残酷的暴君压迫他的人民数十年。

quiz.question: ______ complaisant
quiz.explanation: 殷勤的; 讨好的, 过分殷勤的. His overly complaisant manner seemed insincere. 他过分殷勤的态度似乎不真诚。

quiz.question: conversant ____
quiz.explanation: 熟悉的; 精通的, 熟悉. She is conversant with current technology trends. 她熟悉当前的技术趋势。

quiz.question: incessant _____
quiz.explanation: 不断的; 持续的, 不断的噪音. The incessant noise made it impossible to concentrate. 不断的噪音使人无法集中注意力。

quiz.question: ___ depressant
quiz.explanation: 抑制剂; 镇静剂, 使用镇静剂. Doctors may use depressant medications carefully. 医生可能会谨慎使用镇静剂药物。

quiz.question: puissant _____
quiz.explanation: 强大的; 有力的, 强大的国家. The puissant state dominated regional politics. 强大的国家主导了区域政治。

quiz.question: blatant ___
quiz.explanation: 明目张胆的; 公然的, 明目张胆的谎言. His testimony was a blatant lie. 他的证词是明目张胆的谎言。

quiz.question: ________ reactant
quiz.explanation: 反应物, 化学反应物. The chemical reactant was added to the solution. 化学反应物被加入溶液中。

quiz.question: ___ disinfectant
quiz.explanation: 消毒剂, 使用消毒剂. Always use disinfectant on contaminated surfaces. 始终在受污染的表面使用消毒剂。

quiz.question: ____ inhabitant
quiz.explanation: 居民, 城市居民. The city inhabitant enjoys urban amenities. 城市居民享受城市便利设施。

quiz.question: exorbitant _____
quiz.explanation: 过高的; 过分的, 过高的价格. The hotel charged an exorbitant price for the room. 酒店对房间收取了过高的价格。
